text: Anthony Jules Carp (May 2, 1911 – May 29, 1960) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League in one game for the Chicago Bruins during the 1939–40 season. He also competed in the Amateur Athletic Union, Midwest Basketball Conference, and independent leagues. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Amateur Athletic Union men's basketball players Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Illinois Category:Chicago Bruins players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Tony Carp
